page.title: Bush Accuses Kerry of Scare Tactics
page.text: ABOARD AIR FORCE ONE - President Bush accused John Kerry on Monday of employing "shameless scare tactics" on Social Security and the military draft just before voters go to the polls. In an interview with The Associated Press, Bush also said he'd be disappointed if the Iraqi people chose an Islamic fundamentalist government in free elections, "but democracy is democracy." "If that's what the people choose, that's what the people choose," the president said, two weeks before facing his own re-election...
